meanings.definition: To cook (food) by direct exposure to radiant heat.
meanings.sent1: She rosts the marshmallows over the campfire.
meanings.sent2: My mom rosts the chicken in the oven for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The sun rosts the sand on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent4: The fire rosts the logs until they turn to ash.
meanings.sent5: The chef rosts the vegetables until they are golden and crispy.

meanings.definition: A piece of meat or fish that has been cooked in this way.
meanings.sent1: The delicious rosts on the barbecue smelled amazing.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the salmon rosts for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The juicy rosts were the highlight of the meal.
meanings.sent4: The savory rosts were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent5: The chef's specialty was the perfectly grilled rosts.
